.. pyuvsim documentation master file, created by
   make_index.py on 2018-10-13

pyuvsim
=======

A comprehensive simulation package for radio interferometers in python.

`Build
Status <https://travis-ci.org/RadioAstronomySoftwareGroup/pyuvsim>`__
`Coverage
Status <https://coveralls.io/github/RadioAstronomySoftwareGroup/pyuvsim?branch=master>`__
